Stik z onstranstvom
Preteklih življenj se najpogosteje spominjajo otroci, stari do 5 let. Med njimi jih veliko vidi duhove, čeprav se jih najprej bojijo.
07 Nov 2019, 06:34 by M. B. Z.



Otrok pogosto obvlada veščino iz preteklega življenja ter počne stvari, ki presegajo njegovo starost. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images



Včasih vrata med svetovi po rojstvu ostanejo priprta in otroci se spominjajo preteklih življenj. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images


Čeprav ni oprijemljivih dokazov, ki bi potrdili obstoj posmrtnega življenja, je ljudi vedno zanimalo, ali obstaja življenje po smrti. Starodavne civilizacije, denimo stari Egipčani, so poleg gradnje piramid izvajale posebne pogrebne rituale, zapisane v t. i. Knjigi mrtvih, s katerimi naj bi pomagali umrlemu, da prestopi na drugo stran, in verjeli, da lahko s pomočjo talismanov, ki so jih položili v grobnico pokojnega ter med ovoje njegove mumije, pospremijo dušo v posmrtno življenje. Pri Grkih naj bi se duše umrlih zapeljale do podzemnega sveta umrlih Hada z barko čez reko Stiks.Poleg vseh starodavnih prepričanj, mitologij in obstoječih zapisov pa se še danes pojavljajo tudi paranormalni dogodki, ki jih zaznavajo tudi navadni smrtniki in nakazujejo, da posmrtno življenje obstaja. Onstranstvo se kaže skozi spiritualna doživetja – od klicanja duhov, meditativnih razodetij, šamanskih obredov, terapevtske regresije in hipnoze, v kateri ljudje poročajo o spominih iz preteklih življenj. Ali je potem smiselno sklepati, da če obstajajo pretekla življenja, obstaja tudi posmrtno?Dr. Michael Newton, priznani ameriški hipnoterapevt, je zbral obširno dokazno gradivo, ki ga je zapisoval pri svojih seansah hipnoze s klienti. Njegova študija je vodila do neverjetnih odkritij: več tisoč različnih pacientov je pod hipnozo pripovedovalo enake zgodbe iz preteklih življenj, celo ujemajoče se podrobnosti. Tako so recimo v trenutkih pred smrtjo videli belo svetlobo, prepoznavali so svoje sorodne duše oziroma osebe, ki so pripadale isti družini duš kot oni, njihovo duhovno rast pa naj bi spremljali in vodili duhovni vodniki. Izvedel je, da se vse duše po smrti v fizičnem telesu vrnejo v svet duš, kjer obstaja le čista energija. Ko so se umrle duše pripravljene učiti novih lekcij, si izberejo naslednje življenje in scenarij, ki jim najbolj ustreza. Žal pa ob reinkarnaciji oziroma ponovnem rojstvu pozabijo na svet duš med posameznimi življenji, redke izjeme so nekateri otroci, pri katerih spomin na preteklost ne zbledi.


Včasih vrata med svetovi po rojstvu ostanejo priprta in otroci se spominjajo preteklih življenj. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images

Kot je odkril in potrdil dr. Ian Stevenson, doktor medicine in psihologije, se preteklih življenj najpogosteje spominjajo otroci, stari od dveh do pet let. Prepotoval je Azijo, Evropo in Severno Ameriko, intervjuval in beležil tovrstne primere. V svoji knjigi Dvajset primerov, ki kažejo na reinkarnacijo je dokumentiral 20 otrok z zgodbami iz preteklih življenj. Njegova več kot 50-letna raziskava je odkrila več kot 3000 avtentičnih primerov otrok, ki so se spominjali preteklih življenj. Po sedmem letu so na doživetja pozabili in odrasli, le redki so se spominjali, da so kdaj govorili o preteklem življenju.Otroci so torej najboljši nosilci preteklih spominov. Spomnijo se lahko celo podrobnosti, imen, krajev in drugih pomembnih podatkov, ki jih je mogoče preveriti. Opišejo lahko družino, v kateri so živeli, svoje ime in način smrti. Mnogi se rodijo že z neko napako na telesu, materinim znamenjem ali sledmi brazgotine, ki naj bi bila posledica smrtne rane iz preteklega življenja. To je dokazovala tudi Barbara Brennan, ameriška energijska zdravilka, ki je na istih mestih našla energijske sledi preteklega orožja, ran in poškodb v avri ljudi. Isto dokazuje nerazložljiva navezanost otrok na nekatere kraje ter nerazložljive fobije, denimo pred ognjem kot pretekla izkušnja otroka, ki je umrl v požaru, ali fobija pred utopitvijo kot spomin nekoga, ki je v prejšnjem življenju utonil.Otroci lahko stik z onstranstvom ohranjajo tudi kot mediji. Veliko jih vidi duhove, česar se sprva bojijo. Znan ameriški medij Chip Coffey je v televizijski seriji delal z njimi in se jim pomagal soočiti s svojimi sposobnostmi, premagati strah, se zaščititi ter najti način, kako ločiti svoje sedanje življenje od sledi iz onstranstva.
text:
Contact with beyond
Most of the past lives are remembered by children up to 5 years old. Many of them see ghosts, though they are afraid of them at first.
07 Nov 2019, 06:34 by M. B. Z.



Often a child will master a past life skill and do things beyond his or her age. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images



Sometimes the gates between the worlds after birth remain closed and children remember past lives. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images


Although there is no tangible evidence to support the existence of the afterlife, people have always been interested in whether there is life after death. Ancient civilizations, such as the ancient Egyptians, in addition to the construction of the pyramids, performed specific funeral rituals, written in t. i. Books of the dead, intended to help the deceased cross over, and believe that by using the talismans placed in the tomb of the deceased and wrapping his mummy, they can send the soul to the afterlife. For the Greeks, the souls of the dead are expected to travel to the underworld of the deceased Hades with a barge across the Stiks River. . Beyond is manifested through spiritual experiences - from the calling of spirits, meditative revelations, shamanic rituals, therapeutic regression and hypnosis, in which people report on memories from past lives. Is it then reasonable to conclude that if there are past lives, there is also an afterlife? Michael Newton, a renowned American hypnotherapist, has compiled extensive evidence to record in his hypnosis sessions with clients. His study led to incredible discoveries: thousands of different patients, under hypnosis, told the same stories from past lives, even with matching details. For example, in the moments before death, they saw a white light, they recognized their soul mates or persons who belonged to the same family of souls as them, and their spiritual growth was to be monitored and guided by spiritual guides. He learned that after death, all souls in the physical body return to a world of souls where there is only pure energy. When souls die ready to learn new lessons, they choose the next life and scenario that suits them best. Unfortunately, when they are reincarnated or born again, they forget about the world of souls between individual lives, with rare exceptions for some children whose memory of the past does not fade.


Sometimes the gates between the worlds after birth remain closed and children remember past lives. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images

As discovered and confirmed by dr. Ian Stevenson, MD, PhD, is the most commonly remembered past life for children between the ages of two and five. He traveled through Asia, Europe and North America, interviewing and recording such cases. In his book Twenty Cases Reincarnating, he has documented 20 children with stories from past lives. His more than 50 years of research have identified more than 3000 authentic cases of children who have remembered past lives. After the age of seven, adults have forgotten about their experiences, and few have remembered ever talking about their past lives. Children are therefore the best bearers of past memories. Even details, names, places, and other important verifiable information can be remembered. They can describe the family in which they lived, their name, and their manner of death. Many are already born with a defect in their body, their mother's mark, or a trace of a scar that is thought to be the result of a mortal wound from a past life. Barbara Brennan, an American energy healer who found the energy traces of past weapons, wounds and injuries in the aura of humans, has also proved this. The same is evidenced by the inexplicable attachment of children to certain places and inexplicable phobias, such as before a fire as the past experience of a child who died in a fire, or a phobia before drowning as a memory of someone who has drowned in a previous life. . Many see ghosts, which they are afraid of at first. Famous American medium Chip Coffey worked with them on a television series to help them cope with their abilities, overcome fear, protect themselves, and find a way to separate their current lives from clues from beyond.
